reporter_caption.center: FIRST N. BK NEW ROCHELLE v. FAIRCHESTER OIL, 292 N.Y. 694 (1944)

caption.center: FIRST NATIONAL BANK OF NEW ROCHELLE, Respondent, v. FAIRCHESTER OIL CO.,

court.center: Court of Appeals of the State of New York.

opinion.posture: Appeal from the Supreme Court, Appellate Division, Second Department, NOLAN, J.Page 695
opinion.attorneys:
Wm. Dwight Whitney, John F. Dowd and Ivan S. Skura for appellant.
Henry D. Holden and Monroe J. Cahn for respondent.
opinion.opinion_text:
Judgments affirmed, with costs; no opinion.
Concur: LEHMAN, Ch. J., LOUGHRAN, LEWIS, CONWAY, DESMOND and THACHER, JJ. Taking no part: RIPPEY, J.
